code: import React from'react';import{Chart}from'react-charts';import RoomSolver from'../utilities/RoomSolver';var LineGraph=function LineGraph(props){var data=React.useMemo(function(){return[{label:'Initial Plot',data:RoomSolver(props.plot.data,props.plot.volume)}];},[props]);var axes=React.useMemo(function(){return[{primary:true,type:'log',position:'bottom'},{type:'linear',position:'left'}];},[]);return React.createElement("div",{style:{width:'100%',height:'300px'}},React.createElement(Chart,{data:data,axes:axes,tooltip:true}));};export default LineGraph;
